description:
Auction 24th Jan @ 5pm onwards, The Langham Hotel - 38 Old Burleigh Road, Surfers Paradise.

Situated a mere 450m approx & A direct walk to absolute beachfront in one of the most sought after locations, Mermaid beach!

Are you in search of the perfect position for your future dream home? A great land banking opportunity with excellent potential for capital growth? Or a property to renovate and add value to? Then look no further as you will regret this one if you miss it!

Offered to the market for the first time in over 40 years, is this Single level brick home. This is the one you've been waiting for. A highly derisible address, with every imaginable lifestyle attribute in easy reach, underscoring the beachy ambience of this neat and tidy, single level home. Zoned 'Medium Density', renovators, investors, developers and builders will relish the chance to land bank or profit on this location with some new duplexes (STCA). With the city plan in this precinct potentially relaxing further given its close proximity to the next Stage of the Gold Coast Light Rail, the future is bright.

Offering a 3 bedroom home with separate bathroom and toilet and a fully fenced, flat backyard, this could be the ideal entry point for you into the elusive Mermaid Beach market. Compare prices to the smaller 405m2 blocks on the other side of the highway, only 100m closer to the beach which sell in excess of $2,500,000 for an original knockdown, with busy drive through streets, little street parking and no room for parking.

This tightly held pocket is in high demand due to its proximity to the popular beachside precinct of Nobby's and the relaxed coastal lifestyle it affords the fortunate few that call it home.

This in an absolute must to see as a property that ticks so many boxes, whether you're looking for an affordable lifestyle change in Mermaid Beach, a smart investment, or the opportunity build your dream home, you simply cannot afford to miss this opportunity

So call us today!

Location:

This sought-after precinct also offers proximity to world class shopping at Pacific Fair, the newly refurbished Star Casino and the Broadbeach entertainment precinct, all within a few minutes' drive. Furthermore, enjoy the convenience of proximity to public transport options - once the proposed light rail is completed, you will never need your car, just your walking shoes and a GO card.

Begin your day with a coffee and breakfast at the Surf Club or one of the popular cafes nearby, BSKT. Followed by a leisurely stroll along the beautiful stretch of beach just metres from home. Catch up with friends over a cool drink and meal at one of the many stylish bars suc

Features:
• Medium Density (Residential B) 410m2
• Approx 450m walking distance to the beach
• Could- De-Sac Block
• Prime opportunity to Build your dream home
• Blue chip investment for your portfolio
• Highly sought after location
• Short stroll to stylish bars, restaurants and boutiques of Nobby's
• Stones throw to the beach, Nippers for the kids at Nobby Beach SLSC and
BSKT café
• Dolphin Avenue Early Learning Centre within walking distance, close to
schools including Miami State School and Miami State High, Pizzey Park
and Miami Marketa

Disclaimer: The above information has not been verified. We advise you confirm the accuracy of details before entering into a contract. Amir Prestige and its employees cannot be held responsible for any inaccurate details supplied here.
